TextLang.Text: Do you want to close the browser?
The data type is not supported.
An error occurred during the delete operation.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
15 seconds of video starting from this scene will be set as the icon. If an icon has already been set, it will be overwritten. Do you want to continue?
Access to the media server has been denied. Check the settings for the media server.
A connection to the media server could not be established. Check the settings for the media server and network devices.
The folder could not be accessed. This content may have been deleted from the media server.
Media Server Error: An HTTP error (%1) has occurred.
Media Server Error: A network error has occurred.
Playback has stopped. The content has expired and is no longer available.
The content is not available before the start date.
The content has expired and is no longer available.
This content has a time limit. To perform this operation, go to [Settings] > [Date and Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and then select [Set via Internet] to set the time and date.
This content cannot be played on this system.
Video for this content can only be output using HDMI. To play this content, go to [Settings] > [Display Settings] > [Video Output Settings], and then select [HDMI].
This content cannot be accessed on your account.
Copyright-protected content will not be upscaled.
When the output resolution is 720p, the screen will be displayed as [Normal].
DTCP-IP is not enabled. Go to [Settings] > [System Settings] and enable DTCP-IP.
To perform this operation, go to [Settings] > [Date and Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and then select [Set via Internet] to set the time and date.

An error occurred during DTCP-IP authentication. [Settings] > [Network Settings] > [Internet Connection Settings] > [WLAN Security Setting] is set to [None].
Set to WEP or WPA.
WMA playback is not enabled. Go to [Settings] > [System Settings] and enable WMA playback.
The copyright protection information is invalid.
A USB device that is compatible with copyright-protection features is required to perform this operation.
The title that is currently playing will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The range you can specify has been exceeded.
There are no subtitle options available.
This operation is not available here.
You cannot create an icon less than %1 seconds in length.
The icon could not be created.
Playback stopped. The content being played is protected by Cinavia™ and is not authorized for playback on this device. For more information, see http://www.cinavia.com. Message Code 1.

Audio outputs temporarily muted. Do not adjust the playback volume. The content being played is protected by Cinavia™ and is not authorized for playback on this device. For more information, see http://www.cinavia.com. Message Code 3.
3D content will be displayed starting now.
An error occurred while switching to display in 3D. The screen will go back to display in 2D.
This is DivX® VOD rental content. You can play it %1 time(s) before it expires. Do you want to play the content?
This DivX® VOD rental content cannot be played. The content has expired.
This content cannot be played because this system is not registered properly. For more information, visit http://www.divx.com/vod/.
This content can be used if you renew the license/licence in PlayStation®Store.
To access this content, you must activate this system. Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to activate this system.
The activation information is invalid. Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to activate this system.
To play this content, you must use a Memory Stick PRO™.
A system software update is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] and perform the update.
